entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:26 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:26 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
